title: Edhuku Machan Kadhalu Lyrics Mapla Singam
stanzas: <div>Edhuku Machan Kadhalu Lyrics Mapla Singam

Edhuku machan kadhalu
venaam venaam novalu
kaavu vaangum kadhal mela
kollaatha nee aavalu.(2)

enaku venum kadhalu
adhula illa modhalu
kaalandhorum kaikodukkum
kanneer thaane angelu

sonnaa kaetka marukkura
summa summa sirikkura
kannpinna aasaiyaala
kaanaa poga nenaikkura

unga pechu pudikkala
summa naanum nadikkala
kadhal ennum kottaiya naan
innum katti mudikkala

Edhuku machan kadhalu
venaam venaam novalu
kaavu vaangum kadhal mela
kollaatha nee aavalu.

enaku venum kadhalu
adhula illa modhalu
kaalandhorum kaikodukkum
kanneer thaane angelu

pozhuthum ponna suththi
thirinjaa unna paththi
ulagam enna sollum
venaam machaa venaamda

podhuvaa ponna paththi
thavara sollum buththi
irukku ungakitta
vaaya moodi poyendaa

mannaadhi mannan ellaam
mannaa poanaan ponnaale
machaan nee ponna
nambi pogaathe.

ammaava vittuputta
onnum maela manmela
summa nee over scenum
podaatha.

pennai naadaathe
pinbu vaadaathe
endru siththarum
solli vaithaare.

pennai neengaathe
pinbu yaengaathe
kannadasan sonnaare

pennaale roatil
ne nikkapora pinnaale.

Edhuku machan kadhalu
venaam venaam novalu
kaavu vaangum kadhal mela
kollaatha nee aavalu.

enaku venum kadhalu
adhula illa modhalu
kaalandhorum kaikodukkum
kanneer thaane angelu

mudhalil kannasaippaa
mudivil kai asaippaa
idhuthaan kadhal ingae
venaam machaa venaamda

azhagaa kai kodupaa
azhutha kan thodaipaa
avalaal naanum ingae
superman-ah aavendaa

laila-vaal majunu ingae
patta paadu podhaathaa
machaan ne kadhal sanga
oodhaathe.

laila-kkal illai endral
indha boomi suththadhe
poiya ne pesi nikka
koodaathe.

palla kaataathe
bulbu vaangaathe endru
solluren kelu machchaane

anbu oayaadhe
kuththam aagaathe
solli kadhal seivaene

pennaale oppaari
vaikkapora pinnaale.

Edhuku machan kadhalu
venaam venaam novalu
kaavu vaangum kadhal mela
kollaatha nee aavalu.(2)

enaku venum kadhalu
adhula illa modhalu
kaalandhorum kaikodukkum
kanneer thaane angelu

sonnaa kaetka marukkura
summa summa sirikkura
kannpinna aasaiyaala
kaanaa poga nenaikkura

unga pechu pudikkala
summa naanum nadikkala
kadhal ennum kottaiya naan
innum katti mudikkala
